content.question: In a kinetic study of a reaction, a student measures concentration of one species in the reaction at regular time intervals and graphs the concentration versus time. If the reaction was zeroth order instead of first order, then the graph of concentration versus time would show a

choices.label: slope that becomes less steep over time

skill.text: 5.A: Identify quantities needed to solve a problem from given information (e.g., text, mathematical expressions, graphs, or tables).
